name: Defog.ai
headline: Fine-tuned LLMs for enterprise data analysis
description:
Defog lets your business users query data in seconds, using everyday language.

We are powered by SQLCoder – our state of the art open-source model that can search and visualise structured data (like SQL databases or Data Warehouses), and can be further fine-tuned and and deployed on-prem on your servers.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:generative-ai; industry:machine-learning; industry:open-source; industry:enterprise; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Rishabh Srivastava, Founder
founders.description: ML developer. Previously bootstrapped data APIs co to 100M+ monthly end users. I blog at rish.blog and am fairly active on Twitter (@rishdotblog)

founders.name: Medha Basu, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder of Defog.ai. Former journalist/editor/content marketing person. Grew an enterprise content marketing firm from $0 to 7 figures in yearly revenue. Once interviewed a terrorist.

[![Defog Logo](https://defog.ai/logo.svg)](https://defog.ai/</>)
[Product](https://defog.ai/</product>)[Use Cases](https://defog.ai/</usecases>)[Research](https://defog.ai/</blog>)[Pricing](https://defog.ai/</pricing>)[Contact](https://defog.ai/</contact>)
[Get Started](https://defog.ai/</signup>)
![](https://defog.ai/bg-full-circle.svg)
Never wait for data again
Get the answers you need now, with Defog's best-in-class AI data analyst.
[Get Started Free](https://defog.ai/</signup>)[Try Demo](https://defog.ai/<#demo>)
Used by industry leaders
![Toyota](https://defog.ai/toyota.svg)![Alliance Bernstein](https://defog.ai/alliance-bernstein.svg)![Macmillan](https://defog.ai/macmillan.svg)![Genmab](https://defog.ai/genmab.svg)
Skip the wait.  Get the insights 
Defog is the fastest way to get the data you need, when you need it.
Drill downGet to the specifics without clicking through tons of filters
Got a hunch? Explore broad hypotheses and follow your curiosity
Dive deep Ask follow on questions without waiting on someone else
Take it for a test drive
Choose one of our sample datasets or upload your own CSV to see Defog in action.
Connecting to servers
Use AI you can trust
Trust is at the centre of our work - because you can’t use AI you don’t trust.
[Explore Features](https://defog.ai/</product>)
Your data is private
Your data is never shared with anyone, including with our AI model.
Best in class accuracy
Powered by the best AI model for data analysis.
Adapts to you
Defog learns from your feedback and preferences, and adapts its responses.
Works with all your data
Ask questions about your data, no matter where it lives.
![Icon](https://defog.ai/squares-2x2.svg)
Connectors
Integrate data across all your favorite tools and platforms.
![Icon](https://defog.ai/circle-stack.svg)
Databases
Query any structured database from Postgres to Snowflake.
![Icon](https://defog.ai/arrow-up-tray.svg)
CSVs
No database, no problem. Get started with CSVs.
Powered by SQLCoder
The industry-leading AI model for querying structured data - built by Defog.
![Defog Image](https://defog.ai/sqleval-2-transparent.png)
The most accurate text-to-SQL model
SQLCoder is our specialised large language model to query structured data. It outperforms all major models in the market on these tasks.
[View SQLCoder models](https://defog.ai/<https:/huggingface.co/defog>)
![Defog Image](https://defog.ai/sqlcoder-downloads.png)
>300,000 downloads and counting
Since we open sourced SQLCoder in 2023, it has seen consistent and fast-growing adoption among experts in the field.
![Icon](https://defog.ai/adjustments-vertical.svg)
Robust evaluation platform
SQLEval is our extensible, open-source evaluation framework to measure the accuracy of our models.
[More on SQLEval](https://defog.ai/</blog/open-sourcing-sqleval>)
![Icon](https://defog.ai/magnifying-glass.svg)
Interpretability at the core
Our models are designed to be interpretable and explainable, so you can trust the results it gives you.
What experts say about SQLCoder
“Open models are now starting to surpass GPT-4 for specialized tasks. For example, the best open source model for SQL is SQLCoder-34B.”
Clement Delangue, CEO, Hugging Face
“Defog SQLCoder-34B is faaar better than any other open-source text2sql model out there.”
Pawel Zwadzki, Senior Solutions Architect, AWS
“I have tried pretty much every NL -> SQL model out there, and Defog's model is by far the best. It's one of the only examples I know of more broadly that has been able to achieve GPT4-level results.”
Or Hiltch, Chief Data and AI Architect, JLL
![](https://defog.ai/bg-full-circle.svg)
Break free from bottlenecks
[Get started](https://defog.ai/</signup>)

generated_description:
Defog.ai is a fresh contender in the data analysis space, having launched in 2023 and quickly becoming a part of Y Combinator Batch W23. Nestled in the heart of Mountain View, the company is on a mission to empower enterprises with fine-tuned large language models (LLMs) that make data querying effortless and intuitive.

Originally, Defog aimed to let business users query data in plain language, effectively lowering the barrier to accessing insights. This promise is now powered by their flagship product, SQLCoder, an open-source model that specializes in searching and visualizing structured data—think SQL databases and data warehouses. One of the key selling points of SQLCoder is its adaptability; it can be fine-tuned and deployed on-premises, putting privacy and control back into the hands of enterprises.

Defog's small but mighty team of five is riding the generative AI wave along with a robust portfolio of developer tools aimed at machine learning and open-source solutions. They’ve already managed to grab the attention of industry giants like Toyota and Macmillan, showcasing their product’s prowess in tackling real-world data challenges at scale.

At its core, Defog is about speed and accessibility. It enables users to get immediate answers without the usual waits that come with traditional data querying methods. Users can drill down for specifics or explore broad hypotheses, all while knowing their data remains private and secure—an increasingly crucial selling point in today’s world.

What’s more, their technology is getting noticed in the industry for its accuracy and ease of use. SQLCoder has been lauded for surpassing even some of the leading models on the market, earning endorsements from industry experts who highlight its interpretability and reliability.

Defog isn’t just about traditional data exploration; it actively learns from user interactions, adapting to feedback to improve its responses over time. As more companies recognize the potential of harnessing AI for data analysis, Defog.ai seems poised to become a go-to solution for enterprises looking to leverage their data effectively.

For a deeper dive into what they offer, check them out at [defog.ai](https://defog.ai).
